def date_time():
    days_apart = []
    launched = df["launched"].values
    i = 0
    deadline = df ["deadline"].values
    for x in launched:
        days_apart.append((parser.parse(deadline[i]) - parser.parse(x)).days)
        i = i +1
    return days_apart
